entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then a few flurries beginning before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
